attributes.action: Require two restaurant menus. One with calories one without.
attributes.additional_details: To be more considerate of the possible impact of seeing calories on every menu for those with eating disorders, struggling with food and body dysmorphia.
attributes.background: Add a requirement that there be some menus without calories available upon request

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Do not introduce mandatory calorie labelling to all menus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602343
